name: Carbon Copy
description:
Carbon Copy is a quick questionnaire game designed to test your information literacy in the context of the Coronavirus pandemic! Answer ALL the questions to the best of your ability and play till the end to find out the result.

Made with Twine Sugarcube for the Complexity Jam . Can you guess the meaning behind the game title? Let me know in the comments below after playing!

Image credits: IFLA_infographic.png (available under the downloads section) from the International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions.
